column4: when I ping www.google.com i get Destination Port Unreachable, but when i traceroute www.google.com it works fine. Can anyone help me with this please?
are you able to ping other sites?
No i'm not able to ping other sites, but traceroute works. I can access via the browser too.
so you can reach Google in your browser but can't ping it?
yes
i can't ping my router address too which is weird
Destination Port Unreachable
Yes i can ping localhost
sounds like a firewall thing
how do i check the firewall setting on ubuntu server 10.10?
you can start with 'sudo ufw status'
Status: inactive
does 'host' work? (e.g. 'host google.com')
Yes it does, google.com has address 66.102.11.104
so is ping the only thing not working then?

yes, ping isn't working. I am having trouble with connecting to my ubuntu server's vnc from windows and am unable to mount my shared samba mounts. I'm trying to troubleshoot it- i realised i can ping my server from my windows machine but i'm not able to ping my windows machine from my ubuntu server

samba was working yesterday and I could map the drives from my windows machine. However now it's not working from my windows machine and as part of the  troubleshooting guide goes on: http://www.samba.org/samba/docs/man/Samba-HOWTO-Collection/diagnosis.html it says to test pinging the client machine
so i'm unable to ping and it says my TCP/IP software is not correctly installed... so i'm trying to fix it now but have no idea.
this isn't a solution, but you're not alone: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1648485
i see. I just realised that I can ping my ubuntu server from my windows machine but I'm unable to ping it via my mac
I also realised it doens't connect from my mac machine on the IP address via vnc, it connects via the machine.domain name which is OLYMPIA.LOCAL instead of 192.168.1.77
